metadata.name: LUX* Collectible
metadata.description: The LUX* Grand Gaube Collectible is as extraordinary and exclusive as the experience that comes with it. By owning this collectible, you'll be able to join our community of travel lovers, enjoy unprecedented benefits, as well as our first surprise: claim the exclusive gift that comes with it, an unforgettable stay in Mauritius, including 2 nights in a junior suite for two on half board, a traditional pirogue boating experience to an islet and an exclusive surprise should you wish to extend your trip. Before buying, discover the project (https://luxresorts-nft.com) and check that the stay has not already been claimed on the Tropee platform.

attributes.value: Traditional pirogue boating experience to an islet
